Nwg yuav muab cov ntshaav txwv nyuj ib qho lug hab xuas nwg ntiv teg nchus rua ntawm lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum saab xubndag, hab yuav xuas ntiv teg muab nchus rua lub hau swb xaab saab ntawm hauv ntej xyaa zag.

“Hab Aloo yuav tua tug tshws kws xyeem ua kevcai daws cov pejxeem le txem hab yuav coj cov ntshaav moog rua chaav saab huv daim ntaub kws thaiv, hab muab cov ntshaav tshws ua ib yaam nkaus le cov ntshaav txwv nyuj, yog muab nchus rua sau lub hau swb xaab kws roog kev txhum hab muab nchus rua lub hau swb xaab saab ntawm hauv ntej.

Ua le nuav nwg txhad ua kevcai ntxuav tau tej kev qas tsw huv ntawm chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus vem cov Yixayee tej kev qas tsw huv, hab puab tej kev faav xeeb hab puab tej kev txhum huvsw. Nwg yuav ua le nuav rua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb kws nyob huv plawv cov tuabneeg kws qas tsw huv.

Tsw xob kheev leejtwg nyob huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb rua thaus Aloo nkaag moog rua huv chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus es ua kevcai ntxuav tej kev qas tsw huv moog txug thaus nwg ua kevcai ntxuav nwg hab nwg tsev tuabneeg hab ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg le txem taag.

Mas nwg le tawm moog rua ntawm lub thaaj kws nyob ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab ua kevcai ntxuav tej kev qas tsw huv rua lub thaaj. Nwg yuav muab ntshaav txwv nyuj hab ntshaav tshws ib qho lug pleev plaub tug kub kws nyob puag ncig ntawm lub thaaj.
Hab nwg yuav xuas ntiv teg nchus cov ntshaav ib txha rua lub thaaj xyaa zag, txhad ua kevcai ntxuav tau lub thaaj tu kuas dawb huv ntawm cov Yixayee tej kev qas tsw huv.
“Thaus nwg ua kevcai ntxuav tej kev qas tsw huv rua chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus hab rua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab rua lub thaaj taag lawm, nwg yuav xyeem tug tshws kws tseed caj.

Aloo yuav muab nwg ob txhais teg tso rua sau tug tshws kws tseed caj lub taubhau, hab yuav leeg cov Yixayee suavdawg tej kev phem kev qas hab puab tej kev faav xeeb huvsw hab puab tej kev txhum huvsw, mas nwg yuav muab tej hov huvsw tso rua sau tug tshws hov taubhau mas nwg yuav kuas tug kws npaaj ca lawm xaa tug tshws moog rua tom tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Tug tshws yuav rws tej kev phem kev qas huvsw moog rua lub tebchaws kws tsw muaj tuabneeg nyob. Tes tug kws xaa yuav muab tug tshws tso rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.
“Tes Aloo le nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab yuav hle tej tsoog ntaub maag kws nwg naav rua thaus kws moog rua chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus, mas muab ca rua hov ntawd.

Hab nwg yuav daa dej huv ib lub chaw kws dawb huv hab naav nwg cev tsoog tsho le tawm lug. Nwg yuav xyeem tej kws nwg muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tej kws cov pejxeem muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem txhad ua kevcai ntxuav nwg tug kheej hab cov pejxeem tej kev txhum txem.
Nwg yuav muab tug tsaj kws tua ua kevcai daws txem le roj hlawv rua sau lub thaaj.
Tug kws xaa tug tshws moog rua Axaxee  hov yuav tsum ntxhua nwg cev rwg tsho hab daa dej, mas nwg le lug tau rua huv lub zog.

Yuav coj tug txwv nyuj hab tug tshws kws xyeem ua kevcai daws txem kws Aloo coj cov ntshaav lug ua kevcai ntxuav kev qas tsw huv rua chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus hov moog rua saab nrau lub zog. Mas luas yuav muab tej tawv hab tej nqaj hab tej plaab nyuv hlawv kub nyab taag.
Tug kws muab tej hov hlawv yuav ntxhua nwg cev rwg tsho hab daa dej nwg le lug tau rua huv lub zog.

“Nuav yuav ua kevcai rua mej coj moog ib txhws le, nub xab kaum lub xyaa hli mej yuav tswj mej lub sab  hab tsw xob ua ib yaam num daabtsw, tsw has mej cov kws yug huv lub tebchaws hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob.
Tsua qhov nub nua yog nub kws ua kevcai ntxuav mej tej kev txhum txem hab ntxuav mej. Mej txhad huv ntawm mej tej kev txhum huvsw rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.
Nub nua yog ib nub Xanpatau kws mej yuav tsum caiv su tag tag le. Mej yuav tsum tswj mej lub sab. Nuav yog txuj kevcai kws nyob moog ib txhws.
Tug pov thawj kws raug muab roj laub ywg tsaa ua dawb huv nyob nwg txwv chaw ua pov thawj hlub nwg yog tug kws yuav ua txuj kevcai ntxuav nuav hab naav tsoog tsho ntaub maag dawb huv.

Nwg yuav ua kevcai ntxuav kev qas tsw huv rua chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus hab yuav ua kevcai ntxuav rua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab lub thaaj hab yuav ua kevcai ntxuav cov pov thawj hab ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg tej kev txhum txem.
“Nuav yuav ua kevcai rua mej coj moog ib txhws kuas ua kevcai ntxuav cov Yixayee ib xyoos ib zag vem tim puab tej kev txhum huvsw.”Mauxe kuj ua lawv le Yawmsaub has rua nwg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub hab cov Yixayee suavdawg tas, ‘Ntawm nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub has kuas mej ua.
Yog cov Yixayee leejtwg tua nyuj tua mivnyuas yaaj tua tshws rua huv lub zog lossws tua saab nrau lub zog,

tsw coj tuaj rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb es muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, mas tug hov muaj txem vem nwg ua ntshaav lug. Nwg ua ntshaav lug mas yuav tsum muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.

Ua le nuav sub cov Yixayee txhad le coj tej tsaj kws puab muab tua xyeem tom tej teb tuaj tua xyeem rua Yawmsaub es muab rua tug pov thawj ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab muab tua xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai sws raug zoo.
Mas tug pov thawj yuav muab cov ntshaav hov nchus rua sau Yawmsaub lub thaaj ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab muab cov roj hlawv tsw qaab kuas hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
Mas puab txhad tsw tua tsaj xyeem rua tej daab tshws kws puab deev hov. Qhov nuav yuav ua kevcai rua puab txhua tam moog ib txhws.’
“Hab koj has rua puab tas, ‘Cov Yixayee lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob leejtwg muab tsaj xyeem ua kevcai hlawv xyeem lossws muab tua xyeem,
es nwg tsw coj tug tsaj hov tuaj rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb le maav xyeem rua Yawmsaub, mas muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.
“ ‘Cov Yixayee lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob leejtwg noj ntshaav, kuv yuav tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam tug kws noj ntshaav hov hab muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.

Tsua qhov txhua yaam kws caj sa txujsa yog nyob huv cov ntshaav. Kuv pub cov ntshaav rua mej swv sau lub thaaj ua kevcai ntxuav mej tug kheej kev txhum, tsua qhov cov ntshaav yog yaam kws ntxuav tau kev txhum vem ntshaav yog txujsa.
Yog le nuav kuv txhad has rua cov Yixayee tas, “Tsw kheev mej cov leejtwg noj ntshaav hlo le, hab tsw kheev lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob leejtwg noj ntshaav.”
Cov Yixayee lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob leejtwg moog tua tsaj qus lossws naag noog kws noj tau mas yuav tsum muab cov ntshaav nchuav tseg hab muab moov aav faus.

“ ‘Tsua qhov txhua tug tsaj txujsa puavleej yog nwg cov ntshaav. Vem le nuav kuv txhad has rua cov Yixayee tas, “Mej tsw xob noj yaam tsaj twg ntshaav hlo le, tsua qhov txhua tug tsaj txujsa yog nyob huv cov ntshaav. Leejtwg noj yuav raug muab txav tawm moog.”

Txhua tug kws yug huv lub tebchaws lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws noj tej tsaj tuag lossws tej tsaj kws lwm tug tsaj tum tuag, mas nwg yuav tsum ntxhua nwg cev rwg tsho hab daa dej hab yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj le maav huv.
Yog nwg tsw ntxhua nwg cev rwg tsho hab daa dej, mas nwg yuav rws nwg lub txem.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.

Mej tsw xob ua lawv le kws luas ua huv Iyi tebchaws kws mej txeev nyob. Hab mej tsw xob ua lawv le kws luas ua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws kws kuv saamswm coj mej moog nyob. Tsw xob xyum lawv le puab tej kaab ke.
Mej yuav tsum ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke hab ua lawv nraim. Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke hab kuv tej kevcai, yog ua lawv nraim le ntawd tuabneeg txhad le muaj txujsa nyob tau. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Tsw xob kheev leejtwg moog ze tej kws txheeb txheeb nwg es thws nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Koj tsw xob thws koj nam qhov chaw txaaj muag vem yog thws koj txwv chaw txaaj muag. Nwg yog koj nam, koj tsw xob thws nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag.
Koj tsw xob thws koj txwv quaspuj qhov chaw txaaj muag vem yog thws koj txwv chaw txaaj muag.
Koj tsw xob thws koj tug muam qhov chaw txaaj muag kws yog koj txwv le ntxhais lossws yog koj nam le ntxhais tsw has tug kws yug huv tsev lossws coj saab nrau lug.
Koj tsw xob thws koj tug tub le ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag lossws thws koj tug ntxhais le ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag, vem puab qhov chaw txaaj muag kuj yog koj chaw txaaj muag ntaag.
Koj tsw xob thws koj nam tshab le ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag kws tub yog koj txwv yug, vem nwg kuj yog koj le muam.
Koj tsw xob thws koj puj nyaaj qhov chaw txaaj muag vem nwg tub yog txheeb ze koj txwv.
Koj tsw xob thws koj nam tug nam hluas lossws tug tais laug qhov chaw txaaj muag vem nwg tub yog txheeb ze koj nam.
Koj tsw xob thws koj tug yawm laug lossws koj tug txwv ntxawm qhov chaw txaaj muag es moog ze puab quaspuj vem tub yog koj puj laug lossws koj le nam ntxawm.
Koj tsw xob thws koj tug nyaab qhov chaw txaaj muag vem nwg tub yog koj tug tub quaspuj, tsw xob thws nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag hlo le.
Koj tsw xob thws koj tug nam tij lossws koj tug nam ntxawm qhov chaw txaaj muag vem tub yog koj kw koj tig qhov chaw txaaj muag.

Koj tsw xob thws ib tug puj qhov chaw txaaj muag hab thws nwg tug ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag, hab tsw xob thws nwg tug tub le ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag lossws thws nwg tug ntxhais le ntxhais qhov chaw txaaj muag vem puab yog ib co txheeb ze, yog ua le hov mas phem kawg le.
Koj tsw xob thws koj quaspuj tug tais laug lossws tug nam hluas qhov chaw txaaj muag coj lug sws tw rua thaus koj quaspuj tseed muaj txujsa nyob.
“ ‘Thaus tug quaspuj twg saamswm ua quaspuj kws nwg qas tsw huv mas koj tsw xob moog ze nwg thws nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag.
Koj tsw xob moog nrug kwvtij zej zog tej quaspuj pw, txhad ua rua koj qas tsw huv.
Koj tsw xob muab koj tej mivnyuas hlawv xyeem rua daab Maulej es ua puag tsuas koj tug Vaajtswv lub npe poob koob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Koj tsw xob nrug tej txwvneej pw ua nam txwv yaam le tej quaspuj, yog yaam kws qas vuab tsuab kawg le.
Koj tsw xob nrug tej tsaj txhu pw ua nam txwv ua rua koj qas tsw huv, hab tej quaspuj tsw xob nrug tsaj txhu pw ua nam txwv. Ua le nuav yog kev txhum kev qas kawg le.

“ ‘Mej tsw xob ua tej kev phem kev qas nuav puag tsuas mej qas tsw huv, vem yog tej haiv tuabneeg kws kuv saamswm lawv tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog ua tej kev phem kev qas nuav puag tsuas puab qas tsw huv.
Mas lub tebchaws txhad le qas tsw huv, kuv txhad le rau txem rua lub tebchaws hov tej kev txhum, lub tebchaws txhad le muab cov tuabneeg ntuav pov tseg.
Mas mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke hab kuv tej kevcai hab tsw xob ua tej kev qas vuab tsuab hov, tsw has mej haiv tuabneeg lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob,
tsua qhov cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws nuav kws xub nyob ua mej ntej ua tej kev qas vuab tsuab nuav mas puag tsuas lub tebchaws qas tsw huv.
Ntshai tsaam mej ua puag tsuas lub tebchaws qas tsw huv es lub tebchaws yuav muab mej ntuav pov tseg ib yaam le kws lub tebchaws tub muab haiv tuabneeg kws xub nyob ua mej ntej ntuav pov tseg.
Yog leejtwg ua tej kev qas vuab tsuab hov mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.

Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum ua lawv nraim le kuv has, tsw xob ua lawv le tej kev lis kev cai kws qas vuab tsuab nuav kws cov xub nyob ua mej ntej lawd ua, hab tsw xob ua tej yaam nuav puag tsuas mej qas tsw huv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tas, ‘Mej yuav tsum ua dawb huv, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yog tug dawb huv.
“ ‘Mej txhua tug yuav tsum fwm leej nam leej txwv hab ncu ntsoov su kuv nub Xanpatau. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Tsw xob tig rov moog pe tej txoov daab lossws nchuav txoov daab rua mej. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Thaus mej xyeem tsaj rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai sws raug zoo, yuav tsum xyeem lawv le kevcai kuv txhad txais yuav.
Mej yuav tsum noj tej kws mej xyeem hov rua nub kws mej ua kevcai xyeem lossws rua nub tom qaab. Yog tshuav seem txug nub peb ca le muab hlawv pov tseg.
Yog muab tej kws xyeem hov noj rua nub peb mas yog qas vuab tsuab lawm, kuv yuav tsw txais yuav.
Txhua tug kws noj tej hov yuav rws nwg lub txem, tsua qhov nwg ua rua tej kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub qas puag tsuas lawm, mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.
“ ‘Thaus mej moog hlais qoob huv teb, tsw xob hlais kuas taag tej kws nyob ntawm ntug teb. Thaus hlais lawd tsw xob xawb tej kws tseed tshuav.

Tsw xob de tej txwv maab kuas taag du lug, hab tsw xob khaws tej txwv maab kws poob rua huv mej lub vaaj txwv maab. Yuav tseg ca rua cov tuabneeg pluag hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob ua tub saab, tsw xob ntxo luas, tsw xob ib leeg daag ib leeg.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob tuav kuv lub npe twv daag, yog ua le nuav ua puag tsuas mej tug Vaajtswv lub npe. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob quab yuam kwvtij zej zog lossws lws nwg. Tsw xob sej tej tub zug nqe zug ca rua ntawm mej ib mos txug kaaj ntug.
Tsw xob tsawm foom tug kws laag ntseg lossws muab daabtsw cuab tug kws dig muag kev ua rua nwg dawm. Mej yuav tsum paub ntshai hab fwm mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob tu plaub tsw ncaaj, tsw xob tuaj tug pluag tog lossws saib tug kws ua luj ntsej muag, tassws mej yuav tsum tu plaub ncaaj nceeg rua kwvtij zej zog.
Mej tsw xob moog moog lug lug taug xaiv rua huv mej haiv tuabneeg hab tsw xob ua ib yaam daabtsw txuv lwm tug txujsa. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob ntxub luas lwm tug ca rua nruab sab. Mej yuav tsum ntuag lwm tug kws ua txhum sub mej txhad tsw muaj txem le nwg.
Mej tsw xob ua phem pauj phem lossws cib nyeej rua mej haiv tuabneeg moog le. Mej yuav tsum hlub kwvtij zej zog ib yaam le mej hlub mej tug kheej. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.

“ ‘Mej yuav tsum ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai. Mej tsw xob muab mej tej tsaj ob yaam tso taw ua ke. Mej tsw xob tseb ob yaam noob qoob sws xyaw rua huv mej daim teb. Tsw xob naav tej tsoog kws muab ob yaam ntaub lug xaws ua ke.

“ ‘Yog ib tug txwvneej nrug tug nkauj qhev twg kws lwm tug tub qhab lawm tassws tsw tau txhwv hab tsw tau muab tso nyob ywj pheej pw ua ke, mas ob tug yuav raug txem  tassws tsw raug txem tuag tsua qhov tug nkauj qhev tsw tau nyob ywj pheej.
Tug txwvneej yuav tsum coj ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai ntxuav nwg kev txaug kev txhum tuaj rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb xyeem rua Yawmsaub.

Tug pov thawj yuav muab tug txwv tshws kws xyeem ua kevcai ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum tua xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ntxuav tug hov tej kev txhum kws nwg ua lawm, mas txhad zaam tau nwg lub txem ntawd.
“ ‘Thaus mej txeem moog rua huv lub tebchaws hab cog tej txwv ntoo kws noj tau txhua yaam, mas tej txwv kws tau hov yuav caiv. Mej yuav caiv tsw xob noj tej txwv hov thawj peb xyoos hlo le.
Mas xyoo kws plaub tej txwv hov huvsw yog yaam kws dawb huv, yog yaam kws muab xyeem qhuas Yawmsaub.
Mas xyoo kws tswb mej le noj tau tej txwv hov. Ua le nuav tej txwv txhad txw ncw heev rua mej. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav. Mej tsw xob ua neeb ua yaig ua khawv koob yeeg swv.
Tsw xob txav cov plaubhau ntawm xub ntsus hab tsw xob txhwj mej cov fwj txwv.
Mej tsw xob suam mej lub cev tsua qhov kws muaj tuabneeg tuag lossws txaam cim daabtsw rua mej lub cev. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Tsw xob muab mej tej ntxhais ua nkauj muag cev puag tsuas nwg, tsaam lub tebchaws yuav poob rua txujkev muag cev hab yuav muaj kev phem kev qas puv nkaus lub tebchaws.
Mej yuav tsum ncu su rua kuv nub Xanpatau hab fwm lub chaw kws pe hawm kuv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Tsw xob tig moog rua cov txwv neeb txwv yaig, tsw xob moog nrhav puab ua rua mej qas tsw huv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Mej yuav tsum sawv tseeg saib taug tug kws dawb hau quas paug hab fwm tug laug, hab mej yuav tsum fwm hab paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Thaus lwm haiv tuabneeg nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws, mej tsw xob tswm txom puab.

Mej yuav suav tas lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob kuj zoo ib yaam le yog mej haiv tuabneeg, hab mej yuav hlub puab ib yaam le mej hlub mej tug kheej, tsua qhov mej txeev ua lwm haiv tuabneeg nyob huv Iyi tebchaws. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Mej tsw xob ua txhum qhov kws swv txuj hlua ntsuag hab raab teev kiv hab lub thoob luj kws ntxo luas.
Mej yuav tsum swv raab teev kws ncaaj hab lub thauj teev kws hum, hab swv lub efa hab lub hee  kws hum. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.
Mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke hab kuv tej kevcai huvsw hab ua lawv nraim. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Cov Yixayee hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug cov Yixayee nyob leejtwg muab nwg le mivnyuas tug twg cob rua daab Maulej, mas tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg. Cov pejxeem yuav tsum xuas pob zeb ntaus nwg kuas tuag.

Kuv yuav tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam tug hov hab yuav muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog, tsua qhov nwg tau muab nwg le ib tug mivnyuas cob rua daab Maulej, ua rua lub chaw kws pe kuv qas tsw huv hab ua qas puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv.
Yog cov pejxeem tsw quav ntsej tug kws muab nwg le mivnyuas cob rua daab Maulej hov es tsw muab nwg tua pov tseg,
mas kuv yuav tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam tug ntawd hab nwg tsev tuabneeg hab muab puab txav tawm huv puab haiv tuabneeg moog tsw has nwg hab txhua tug kws lawv nwg kua moog deev daab Maulej.
“ ‘Yog leejtwg tig moog nrhav txwv neeb txwv yaig hab ua puj muag cev rua puab kuv yuav tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam tug ntawd hab muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg.
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum tu mej tug kheej kuas dawb huv rua Vaajtswv hab ua tuabneeg dawb huv, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke hab ua lawv nraim. Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws muab mej cais kuas dawb huv.
Txhua tug kws tshev foom nwg nam nwg txwv yuav raug muab tua pov tseg. Nwg tau tshev foom nwg nam nwg txwv, mas qhov kws nwg tuag hov nwg rws nwg ib leeg.
“ ‘Yog leejtwg deev luas tej le quaspuj, mas ob tug kws sws deev hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Tug kws nrug nwg txwv tug quaspuj pw, kuj yog nwg thws nwg txwv qhov chaw txaaj muag. Ob tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg, mas qhov kws ob tug tuag hov ob tug rws ob tug.
Yog leejtwg nrug nwg tug nyaab pw, mas ob tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg. Ob tug ua dev mas qhov kws ob tug tuag hov ob tug rws ob tug.
Yog ib tug txwvneej deev ib tug txwvneej yaam le deev quaspuj, mas ob tug tau ua qas vuab tsuab. Ob tug yuav raug muab tua pov tseg, mas qhov kws ob tug tuag hov ob tug rws ob tug.
Yog leejtwg yuav tug ntxhais ua quaspuj hab tseed yuav leej nam ua quaspuj, mas yog qhov phem. Mas puab peb leeg yuav raug muab hlawv pov tseg, sub txhad tsw muaj kev phem nyob huv mej.
Yog tug txwvneej twg deev tsaj txhu, tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg hab mej yuav muab tug tsaj hov tua pov tseg.
Yog tug puj twg txaav ze ib tug tsaj txhu hab deev tug tsaj hov, mej yuav muab tug quaspuj hab tug tsaj hov tua pov tseg. Qhov kws ob tug tuag hov ob tug rws ob tug.

“ ‘Yog leejtwg coj nwg tug muam kws yog nwg txwv le ntxhais lossws yog nwg nam le ntxhais moog thws qhov chaw txaaj muag saib hab tug ntxhais pum nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag, kuj yog ua txaaj muag heev. Ob tug yuav raug muab txav tawm taab meeg ob tug haiv tuabneeg. Nwg tau thws nwg tug muam qhov chaw txaaj muag, nwg yuav rws nwg lub txem.
Yog leejtwg nrug tug quaspuj kws tseed ua quaspuj pw hab thws nwg qhov chaw txaaj muag, yog ob tug thws qhov chaw lug ntshaav. Ob tug yuav raug muab txav tawm huv ob tug haiv tuabneeg.
Mej tsw xob thws mej nam le tais laug lossws nam hluas lossws mej txwv le muam qhov chaw txaaj muag, vem yog thws tug kws txheeb mej qhov chaw txaaj muag. Puab yuav rws puab lub txem.
Yog leejtwg nrug nwg tug yawm laug le quaspuj pw, kuj yog nwg thws yawm laug qhov chaw txaaj muag. Ob tug yuav rws ob tug lub txem, ob tug yuav tuag tsw muaj mivnyuas.
Yog leejtwg yuav nwg tug tijlaug lossws tug kwv quaspuj, kuj yog kev qas tsw huv. Nwg tau thws nwg kwvtij qhov chaw txaaj muag, ob tug yuav tsw muaj mivnyuas.
“ ‘Mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej kaab ke huvsw hab kuv tej kevcai huvsw hab ua lawv nraim, sub lub tebchaws kws kuv coj mej lug nyob huv txhad tsw muab mej ntuav tawm.
Mej tsw xob ua lawv le cov tuabneeg kws kuv muab ntab tswv tawm ntawm mej hauv ntej lawd tej kevcai. Vem tas puab ua tej kws has taag nuav, kuv txhad ntxub puab kawg le.

Tassws kuv tub has rua mej lawm tas, “Mej yuav tau puab lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg, hab kuv yuav muab ua mej teej mej tug, yog lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo.”Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws tau muab mej cais tawm huv ib tsoom tuabneeg lug.

Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum cais tej tsaj kws huv hab tej tsaj kws tsw huv, hab cais tej noog kws tsw huv hab tej noog kws huv. Mej tsw xob ua rua mej qas vuab tsuab vem yog tim tej tsaj twg lossws tej noog twg lossws ib yaam daabtsw kws nkaag huv aav kws kuv tau muab qha cais rua mej lawm tas yog yaam kws qas tsw huv.
Mej yuav tsum dawb huv rua kuv, tsua qhov kuv kws yog Yawmsaub yog tug dawb huv, hab kuv tau muab mej cais tawm huv ib tsoom tuabneeg lug sub mej txhad le yog kuv tug.
“ ‘Tug txwvneej twg lossws tug puj twg kws ua txwv neeb txwv yaig mas yuav raug muab tua pov tseg. Yuav xuas pob zeb ntaus kuas tuag, mas qhov kws puab tuag hov puab rws puab.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le has rua cov pov thawj kws yog Aloo tej tub tas, ‘Tsw xob ca mej cov pov thawj ib tug twg ua puag tsuas nwg tsua qhov kws moog paam tug tuag huv nwg cov kwvtij,
tsuas yog tej kws txheeb txheeb nwg xwb, yog nwg nam nwg txwv nwg tub nwg ntxhais nwg tij nwg kwv
lossws nwg tug nkauj muam kws nrug nwg nyob vem tsw muaj quasyawg mas tug pov thawj yeem ca nwg qas tsw huv.
Nwg tsw xob paam nwg tej neej tsaa es ua rua nwg qas tsw huv, hab ua puag tsuas nwg poob koob.
Cov pov thawj tsw xob chais ib nyuas qhov plaubhau hab tsw xob txav cov fwj txwv, hab tsw xob muab rag suam lub cev.

Cov pov thawj yuav tsum ua tuabneeg dawb huv rua puab tug Vaajtswv tsw xob ua puag tsuas puab tug Vaajtswv lub npe poob koob, vem yog puab muab hov txhua chaw hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub, yog tej zaub mov xyeem rua puab tug Vaajtswv. Vem le nuav puab yuav tsum ua dawb huv.
“ ‘Cov pov thawj tsw xob yuav tej puj muag cev lossws tej quaspuj kws qas tsw huv lossws tej quaspuj kws nrauj quasyawg tsua qhov cov pov thawj yeej yog dawb huv rua puab tug Vaajtswv.

Koj yuav tsum tu kuas puab dawb huv rua kuv vem puab xyeem tej zaub mov rua koj tug Vaajtswv. Koj yuav tsum pum tas puab dawb huv, tsua qhov kuv kws yog Yawmsaub kuj dawb huv, kuv yog tug kws tu kuas mej dawb huv.
Tug pov thawj twg tug nthxais moog ua puj muag cev ua rua nwg qas tsw huv mas kuj yog ua puag tsuas leej txwv poob koob. Nwg yuav raug muab hlawv pov tseg.

“ ‘Tug pov thawj hlub kws raug muab roj laub ywg sau nwg taubhau tsaa ua pov thawj hlub hab yog tug kws raug muab tu kuas dawb huv es naav tau cev tsoog meej mom mas tsw xob tseg plaubhau ntxhuv ntxhuv hab tsw xob dua nwg lub tsho.
Nwg tsw xob moog ze tug tuag, tsw xob ua puag tsuas nwg qas tsw huv txawm yog nwg txwv nwg nam tuag los xwj.

Nwg tsw xob tawm huv lub chaw pe hawm Vaajtswv moog hab tsw xob ua qas puag tsuas lub chaw pe hawm nwg tug Vaajtswv poob koob, tsua qhov cov roj kws laub tsaa nwg ua tug dawb huv rua nwg tug Vaajtswv tseed nyob ntawm nwg. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Nwg yuav tsum yuav tug quaspuj kws tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug.
Nwg tsw xob yuav tej puj ntsuag, tej puj nrauj, tej puj kws qas tsw huv lossws tej puj muag cev. Nwg yuav tsum yuav tug quaspuj kws tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug huv nwg haiv tuabneeg lug ua quaspuj,
sub nwg txhad tsw ua qas puag tsuas nwg tej mivnyuas poob koob rua huv nwg haiv tuabneeg, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub kws cais nwg ua tug dawb huv.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Koj caaj ceg moog ib tam dhau ib tam tsw xob kheev ib tug kws lub cev muaj ib qho phem hovtwg tuaj ze xyeem tej zaub mov rua nwg tug Vaajtswv,
tsua qhov tas tug kws muaj ib qho phem hovtwg nkaag tsw nyog moog ze lub thaaj, tsw has tug dig muag, lossws ceg tawv, lossws tug kws caws ntsej caws ntswg lossws teg taw ntev tsw sws txwg,
lossws caws teg caws taw,
lossws khoov duav khoov pu, lossws tug kws moj pob lossws pum kev tsw zoo, lossws mob lis mob ruas lug kua paug, lossws noob qais nkaum.

“ ‘Tug pov thawj Aloo caaj ceg yog leejtwg kws lub cev phem ib qho hovtwg tsw xob kheev nwg tuaj ze muab luas tej hov txhua chaw hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub. Vem nwg lub cev muaj ib qho phem, tsw xob kheev nwg tuaj ze xyeem tej zaub mov rua nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Nwg noj tau nwg tug Vaajtswv zaub mov tsw has tej kws dawb huv kawg nkaus hab tej kws dawb huv.

Tassws nwg tsw xob tuaj ze daim ntaub kws thaiv hab ze lub thaaj tsua qhov nwg lub cev muaj ib qho phem, sub nwg txhad tsw ua puag tsuas lub chaw kws pe kuv poob koob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws muab lub chaw hov cais kuas dawb huv.’ ”
Mauxe txhad has tej nuav rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub hab cov Yixayee suavdawg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub kuas txaav deb ntawm tej hov txhua chaw dawb huv kws cov Yixayee muab pub hlo rua kuv ua kuv tug, sub puab txhad tsw ua puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv poob koob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Ca le has rua puab tas, ‘Yog mej caaj ceg ib tam dhau ib tam moog le leejtwg moog ze tej hov txhua chaw dawb huv kws cov Yixayee muab pub hlo rua kuv ua kuv tug rua thaus kws nwg tseed qas tsw huv, mas nwg yuav raug muab tshem tawm moog kuas dhau kuv lub xubndag. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Yog Aloo caaj ceg ib tug twg ua mob lis mob ruas lossws muaj kua ndwg lug mas nwg noj tsw nyog tej kws xyeem dawb huv hov, ca nwg zoo huv tsaiv. Yog leejtwg kov raug tej yaam qas tsw huv vem tej hov tub phaav tej cev tuag lawm, lossws nwg muaj kua phev ndwg lug,
lossws nwg kov raug tej tsaj miv miv kws nkaag huv peg teb, kws ua rua nwg qas tsw huv, lossws nwg kov raug tej tuabneeg kws puag tsuas nwg qas tsw huv, txawm yog yaam kws qas tsw huv twg,
los tug kws kov raug tej hov nwg kuj yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj. Nwg noj tsw nyog tej kws xyeem dawb huv, nwg yuav tsum daa dej tsaiv.
Thaus nub poob qho lawd nwg txhad le huv tes nwg le maav noj tau tej kws xyeem dawb huv hov, tsua qhov tej ntawd yog nwg le zaub mov.
Tej tsaj kws nwg tuag nwg lossws raug ib tug tsaj qus tum tuag mas nwg tsw xob noj le. Tej nuav yuav puag tsuas nwg qas tsw huv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Vem le nuav cov pov thawj yuav tsum ua lawv le kws kuv has, tsaam tes thaus puab ua tej nuav puab yuav raug txem hab puab yuav tuag vem puab saib tsw taug kuv tej lug. Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws cais puab ua cov kws dawb huv.
“ ‘Tsuas yog cov pov thawj tsev tuabneeg txhad noj nyog tej kws xyeem dawb huv. Cov kws tuaj ua qhua rua huv tug pov thawj tsev hab tug pov thawj tej tub zug los noj tsw nyog tej kws dawb huv hov.
Tassws yog tug pov thawj muab nyaj yuav ib tug ua nwg tug qhev mas tug qhev hov noj tau hab cov qhev kws yug rua huv tug pov thawj tsev kuj noj tau tej zaub mov hov.
Yog pov thawj tej ntxhais moog yuav quasyawg rua cov kws tsw ua pov thawj mas nwg kuj noj tsw nyog tej kws xyeem dawb huv hov.

Tassws yog pov thawj tug ntxhais hov ua puj ntsuag lossws ua puj nrauj lawm hab tsw muaj mivnyuas es rov lug nyob huv leej txwv tsev ib yaam nkaus le thaus hluas nkauj, mas nwg kuj noj tau leej txwv tej zaub mov hov. Tassws cov kws nyob saab nrau noj tsw nyog.
Yog leejtwg tsw paub es nwg tau noj tej kws xyeem dawb huv hov lawm mas nwg yuav tsum pauj tej ntawd rov rua tug pov thawj hab ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua nwg.
Cov pov thawj tsw xob muab tej hov txhua chaw dawb huv kws cov Yixayee muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub hov ua puag tsuas qas tsw huv,
tsaam tes ua rua cov Yixayee raug txem tsua qhov kws ca puab noj txhum tej hov txhua chaw kws xyeem dawb huv, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub kws cais cov pov thawj ua cov kws dawb huv.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub hab cov Yixayee suavdawg tas, ‘Thaus cov Yixayee lossws lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug cov Yixayee nyob leejtwg muab hov txhua chaw xyeem, txawm yog nwg pauj tej kws nwg fev ca lawd lossws nwg zoo sab muab xyeem pub xwb ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem rua Yawmsaub,
yog yuav ua kuas Vaajtswv txais yuav mas mej yuav tsum muab ib tug txwv tsaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le xyeem, kws yog ib tug txwv nyuj lossws txwv yaaj lossws txwv tshws.
Mej tsw xob muab tej kws muaj chaw thuaj xyeem vem Yawmsaub tsw txais yuav.

“ ‘Thaus leejtwg muab ib tug nyuj lossws yaaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo, yog nwg pauj tej kws nwg fev ca lawd lossws nwg zoo sab muab xyeem pub xwb, mas tug tsaj hov yuav tsum yog ib tug zoo kawg hab yuav tsum tsw xob muaj chaw thuaj hlo le, Vaajtswv txhad le txais yuav.

Tej tsaj kws dig muag lossws ceg tawv lossws muab txav muab hlais lossws muaj kav txhaab ua kua paug lossws lam txwv lossws ua cos pob, mej tsw xob muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub lossws muab hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub sau lub thaaj.

Tej txwv nyuj lossws tej mivnyuas yaaj kws lub cev hlub tsw sws luag ib ceg ntev ib ceg luv, mas mej muab xyeem tau le kws mej zoo sab muab pub xyeem, tassws yog muab xyeem pauj tej kws mej fev ca lawd, mas Vaajtswv tsw txais yuav.
Tej tsaj kws noob qais ntsoog lossws muab tsoo lossws muab dua lossws muab txav mej tsw xob muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub lossws tua xyeem rua huv mej lub tebchaws.

Tsw xob muab tej tsaj zoo le nuav kws mej tau ntawm lwm haiv tuabneeg lug xyeem ua zaub mov rua mej tug Vaajtswv. Tej tsaj hov muaj chaw thuaj vem raug muab txav muab hlais, tes Vaajtswv tsw txais yuav.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Thaus nyuj hab yaaj hab tshws xyaa mivnyuas mas ca tug mivnyuas nrug nam nyob xyaa nub. Txwj nub kws yim moog, mas yuav muab hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub los kuj tau lawm, Vaajtswv txais yuav.
Tug nam tsaj ntawd tsw has yog nyuj los yaaj mej tsw xob muab tua nrug tug mivnyuas ua ib nub.
Thaus mej tua tsaj xyeem ua Yawmsaub tsaug, mej yuav tsum tua xyeem lawv le kevcai Vaajtswv txhad txais yuav mej.
Mej yuav tsum noj tej nqaj hov kuas taag rua tuab nub hov, tsw xob tseg ib yaam ca txug kaaj ntug. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“Mej yuav tsum tuav rawv kuv tej lug nkaw hab ua lawv quas nraim. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Mej tsw xob ua puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv poob koob. Kuv xaav kuas cov Yixayee suavdawg fwm tas kuv dawb huv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws cais kuas mej dawb huv.
Kuv yog tug kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug kuv txhad tau ua mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Yawmsaub tej kevcai kws teem tseg kws mej yuav tsum tshaaj tawm tas yog lub swjhawm kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, yog tej kevcai kws kuv teem tseg mas yog le nuav.

“ ‘Mej yuav tsum ua num rau nub, mas nub xyaa yog nub Xanpatau kws caiv su tag tag le, yog nub kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv. Tsw xob ua num hlo le, yog nub Xanpatau kws su rua Yawmsaub rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob.
“ ‘Tej nuav yog tej kevcai kws Yawmsaub teem tseg, yog tej lub swjhawm kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv. Mej yuav tsum tshaaj tawm lawv tej swjhawm kws teem ca.
Nub xab kaum plaub lub ib hlis thaus yuav tsaus ntuj yuav ua Yawmsaub le kevcai Hlaa Dhau.
Nub xab kaum tswb lub hli ntawd yuav ua kevcai noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb rua Yawmsaub. Mej yuav noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb xyaa nub.
Thawj nub mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv. Mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav hlo le.
Mej yuav muab tsaj hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub xyaa nub. Nub kws xyaa yog nub kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav hlo le.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej moog txug lub tebchaws kws kuv pub rua mej hab mej sau tej qoob huv lub tebchaws hov, mej yuav tsum coj ib teg qoob kws mej hlais thawj phaum tuaj rua tug pov thawj.
Tug pov thawj yuav muab teg qoob hov cev xyeem rua Yawmsaub sub Yawmsaub txhad le txais yuav mej. Nwg yuav muab cev xyeem rua nub tom qaab nub Xanpatau.
Nub kws mej ua kevcai cev xyeem teg qoob hov, mej yuav tsum coj ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le tuaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub.

Tej kws muab ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos ua ke yog muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa  moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kuas muaj paa nchu tsw qaab, hab ib feem plaub huv ib hee  cawv txwv maab ua kevcai laub xyeem.

Mej tsw xob noj cov qoob tshab tsw has muab ua ncuav lossws muab kib los noj nyoog tog txug thaus kws coj tuaj ua kevcai le nuav xyeem rua mej tug Vaajtswv taag tsaiv. Nuav yog txuj kevcai rua mej txhua tam moog ib txhws rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob.
“ ‘Mej yuav tsum suav txwj nub tom qaab nub Xanpatau kws yog nub mej coj thawj teg qoob tuaj cev xyeem kuas puv xyaa lub chib su.
Mej yuav suav tswb caug nub moog txug nub tom qaab nub Xanpatau kws xyaa, le muab tej mog tshab tuaj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos rua Yawmsaub.
Mej yuav coj ob lub ncuav kws muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa  moov mog zoo zoo kws xyaw keeb ua tawm huv mej lub chaw nyob tuaj cev xyeem ua thawj phaum qoob xyeem rua Yawmsaub.

Mej yuav coj xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le hab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab ob tug txwv yaaj tuaj nrug cov ncuav xyeem ua ke. Tej nuav yog tej kws ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab ua kevcai laub xyeem, yog yaam kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem ua kuas muaj paa nchu tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
Mej yuav tsum xyeem ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai daws txem hab xyeem ob tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos ua kevcai sws raug zoo.

Tug pov thawj yuav muab ob tug mivnyuas yaaj nrug cov ncuav kws yog thawj phaum qoob cev xyeem ua ke ua kevcai cev xyeem rua Yawmsaub. Tej nuav yog tej kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub muab ua pov thawj le feem.

Tuab nub ntawd mej yuav tshaaj tawm. Mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua num nyaav hlo le. Nuav yog tej kaab ke rua mej txhua tam moog ib txhws rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob.

“ ‘Thaus mej hlais tej qoob huv teb, mej tsw xob hlais kuas taag tej kws nyob ntawm ntug teb, hab thaus sau taag tsw xob xawb tej kws tshuav. Yuav tseg ca rua cov tuabneeg pluag hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Nub xab ib lub xyaa hli mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov caiv su tag tag le, yog nub kws tshuab raaj kub yaaj tshaaj tawm, yog nub kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv.
Mej tsw xob ua num nyaav, hab mej yuav tsum coj tej kws hlawv xyeem tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Nub xab kaum lub xyaa hli nuav yog nub kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum. Yuav ua nub kws mej tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, hab mej yuav tswj mej lub sab  hab coj tej kws hlawv xyeem tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
Nub ntawd mej tsw xob ua num daabtsw le tsua qhov yog nub ntxuav kev txhum, sub txhad ntxuav tau mej tej kev txhum rua ntawm mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub xubndag.
Nub ntawd yog leejtwg tsw tswj nwg lub sab  tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg.
Hab nub ntawd yog leejtwg ua ib yaam num daabtsw kuv yuav muab tug hov ua kuas puam tsuaj huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.
Mej tsw xob ua num hlo le. Nuav yog tej kaab ke rua mej txhua tam moog ib txhws rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob.
Nub ntawd yuav ua nub Xanpatau kws caiv su tag tag, hab mej yuav tswj mej lub sab.  Thaus tsaus ntuj nub xab cuaj lub hlis ntawd mej yuav tuav rawv nub Xanpatau moog txug nub qaab tsaus ntuj.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Nub xab kaum tswb lub xyaa hli nuav yog kevcai nyob tsev pheeb suav rua Yawmsaub kuas puv xyaa nub.
Thawj nub yuav ua nub kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv. Mej tsw xob ua num nyaav.

Mej yuav coj tej kws hlawv xyeem tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub kuas puv xyaa nub. Nub kws yim mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv hab coj tej kws hlawv xyeem tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub. Yog tuaj txoos ua ke caiv su. Mej tsw xob ua num nyaav hlo le.

“ ‘Tej nuav yog Yawmsaub tej kevcai kws teem tseg kws mej yuav tsum tshaaj tawm tas yog lub swjhawm kws tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, hab yuav coj tej kws xyeem tuaj hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub, yog tej kws yuav ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, hab tej tsaj kws tua xyeem hab tej kws muab laub xyeem, txhua yaam yuav tsum ua lawv le swjhawm.

Tej nuav yog ua tshaaj tej kws ua rua Yawmsaub nub Xanpatau hab tshaaj tej kws mej muab xyeem hab tshaaj txhua yaam kws mej fev ca lawd hab tshaaj tej kws mej zoo sab muab xyeem pub huvsw, kws mej pub xyeem rua Yawmsaub.

“ ‘Thaus mej sau tej qoob loos huv lub tebchaws taag lawm, mas nub xab kaum tswb lub xyaa hli, mej yuav ua qhov kevcai nuav rua Yawmsaub xyaa nub. Thawj nub yuav ua nub kws caiv su tag tag, hab nub kws yim kuj yuav ua nub kws caiv su tag tag hab.

Thawj nub mej yuav de tej txwv ntoo zoo zoo hab tej nplooj toov laaj hab tej rev nplooj ntoo hab tej ceg ntoo lwg zaaj tuaj. Mej yuav zoo sab xyiv faab xyaa nub rua ntawm Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv xubndag.
Mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov ua qhov kevcai nuav ib xyoos xyaa nub rua Yawmsaub. Nuav yog tej kaab ke rua mej txhua tam moog ib txhws. Mej yuav tsum ua qhov kevcai nuav rua lub xyaa hli.
Mej yuav nyob huv tsev pheeb suav xyaa nub. Txhua tug kws yog tuabneeg Yixayee yuav tsum nyob huv tsev pheeb suav,
sub mej txhua tam txhad paub tas thaus kuv coj cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug kuv ua rua puab nyob huv tsev pheeb suav. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”
Ua le nuav Mauxe txhad qha rua cov Yixayee paub txug Yawmsaub tej kevcai kws teem tseg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee kuas coj cov tseem roj kws tsuam ntawm txwv aulib tuaj rua koj saam lub teeb, sub lub teeb txhad cig moog le.

Aloo yuav tsum tu lub teeb kws nyob huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb ntawm daim ntaub thaiv lub swb xaab kws muaj Vaajtswv tej lug saab nrau nuav txwj thaus tsaus ntuj moog txug kaaj ntug tsw tu ncua le rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Nuav yog txuj kaab ke rua mej txhua tam moog ib txhws.
Aloo yuav tu tej teeb kws nyob sau tug kaav teeb kws tseem kub rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag tsw tu ncua le.
“Koj yuav muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ua kaum ob lub ncuav. Ib lub ncuav swv ob feem kaum huv ib efa  moov mog.
Koj yuav txawb cov ncuav nuav rua sau lub rooj kws tseem kub ua ob leej, ib leej rau lub.
Koj yuav muab cov roj ntoos tsw qaab kws zoo zoo rau rua ob leej huvsw, sub txhad nrug cov ncuav ua chaw rua Yawmsaub ncu ntsoov hab muab ua yaam kws hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
Txhua nub Xanpatau Aloo yuav tsum muab txawb tsw tu ncua lawv le kevcai ua cov Yixayee tug rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ua lu lug cog tseg moog ib txhws.

Cov ncuav nuav yuav poob ua Aloo hab nwg cov tub le feem, mas puab yuav noj rua huv ib lub chaw kws dawb huv tsua qhov yog yaam kws dawb huv kawg nkaus rhu ntawm tej kws muab hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub lug, yog puab le feem moog ib txhws le.”
Muaj ib tug yawm, nwg nam yog tuabneeg Yixayee nwg txwv yog tuabneeg Iyi, txawm moog tshaam cov Yixayee, mas nwg nrug ib tug yawm Yixayee sws caav sws tshe huv lub zog.
Tug yawm kws nwg nam yog tuabneeg Yixayee hov has lug tuam mom tshev foom Yawmsaub lub npe. Puab txhad coj nwg tuaj rua Mauxe. Nwg nam npe hu ua Selaumi kws yog Ntinpli yog xeem Ntaaj le ntxhais.
Puab txhad muab tug yawm hov kaw ca tog txug thaus Yawmsaub qha tej kws Yawmsaub lub sab xaav rua puab paub.
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le coj tug tshev foom hov rua saab nrau lub zog mas kuas cov kws nov nwg tshev foom suavdawg muab teg npuab rua sau nwg taubhau, mas ib tsoom pejxeem xuas pob zeb ntaus kuas nwg tuag.
Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Leejtwg tshev foom nwg tug Vaajtswv nwg yuav rws nwg lub txem.

Tug kws tuam mom Yawmsaub lub npe yuav raug muab tua pov tseg. Ib tsoom pejxeem yuav xuas pob zeb ntaus nwg kuas tuag. Lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob lossws cov Yixayee thaus tug twg tuam mom Yawmsaub lub npe nwg yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
“ ‘Tug kws tua tuabneeg kuj yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Tug kws tua lwm tug le tsaj txhu yuav tsum them sav pauj sav.
Yog leejtwg ua rua nwg kwvtij zej zog raug mob, kuj yuav ua rua nwg ib yaam nkaus le nwg tau ua rua luas lawm,
pob txhaa luv pauj pob txhaa luv, qhov muag pauj qhov muag, nav pauj nav. Nwg ua rua luas raug mob le caag, nwg yuav raug mob ib yaam le ntawd.
Tug kws tua lwm tug le tsaj txhu yuav tsum them pauj. Tug kws tua tuabneeg nwg yuav tsum raug muab tua pov tseg.
Mej yuav tsum swv tuab txuj kevcai rua lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob hab rua cov Yixayee, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”

Mauxe txhad has le ntawd rua cov Yixayee, mas puab txhad coj tug kws tshev foom hov tawm moog rua saab nrau lub zog hab xuas pob zeb ntaus nwg kuas tuag. Ua le nuav cov Yixayee txhad ua lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe sau lub roob Xinai tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej txeem moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv pub rua mej hov, mas ca lub tebchaws muaj xyoo Xanpatau kws su rua Yawmsaub.
Mej yuav cog qoob cog loos rua mej tej teb rau xyoo hab taav tej txwv maab hab sau qoob loos rau xyoo.
Tassws xyoo kws xyaa mas ca ua xyoo Xanpatau kws lub tebchaws su tug tug, yog xyoo Xanpatau rua Yawmsaub. Mej tsw xob cog qoob loos rua huv mej tej teb, tsw xob taav txwv maab huv mej tej vaaj.
Tej qoob loos kws nwg tuaj nwg mej tsw xob hlais tsw xob sau, tej txwv maab kws mej tsw tau taav tsw tau tu mej tsw xob de. Ca ua xyoo kws lub tebchaws su tug tug.

Xyoo Xanpatau hov lub tebchaws tseed yuav tshwm tau qoob loos rua mej noj, pub rua mej hab rua mej tej tub qhe nkauj qhev hab rua mej tej tub zug hab pub rua tej tuabneeg lwm tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob.
Hab tej qoob loos kws tshwm huv lub tebchaws huvsw mas pub rua mej tej tsaj txhu hab tej tsaj qus noj.’ ”
“ ‘Mej yuav tsum suav xyaa tug xyaa xyoo txhad yog plaub caug cuaj xyoos rua mej.
Mej yuav tshuab raaj kub yaaj nrov kuas thoob tebchaws rua nub xab kaum lub xyaa hli, yuav tshuab raaj kub yaaj kuas thoob tebchaws rua nub kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum txem.

Mej yuav tsum fwm xyoo kws tswb caug hov ua xyoo kws dawb huv hab yuav tshaaj tawm kev thaaj yeeb rua ib tsoom tuabneeg thoob mej lub tebchaws, ua xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab. Mej txhua tug yuav tsum rov moog rua nwg qub vaaj qub tse hab rov moog nrug nwg cuab tuabneeg nyob.
Xyoo kws tswb caug hov yuav ua xyoo Zoo Sab rua mej. Xyoo hov mej tsw xob cog qoob cog loos hab tsw xob hlais sau tej qoob loos kws nwg tuaj nwg, hab tsw xob de tej txwv maab kws tsw tau taav ceg,
vem xyoo hov yog xyoo Zoo Sab xyiv faab, yuav ua xyoo dawb huv rua mej. Mej tsuas noj tej qoob loos kws nwg tuaj nwg huv tej laj teb xwb.
“ ‘Xyoo Zoo Sab nuav mas txhua tug yuav tsum rov moog txug nwg qub vaaj qub tse.
Yog mej muag laj muag teb rua kwvtij zej zog lossws yuav laj teb ntawm kwvtij zej zog lug mas ib leeg tsw xob ntxo ib leeg.
Mej yuav kwvtij zej zog laj teb mas mej yuav ntaus nqe lawv le cov quas xyoo kws dhau xyoo Zoo Sab lug lawm, hab muag tau npaum le cov quas xyoo kws tseed sau tau qoob loos.
Yog tseed tshuav ntau xyoo kuj nce nqe sab zog, yog tshuav tsawg xyoo lawm kuj nqeg nqe, vem nwg muag lawv le cov naj xyoo kws sau tau qoob loos.
Ib leeg tsw xob ntxo ib leeg. Mej yuav tsum paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv, vem kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Vem le nuav mej yuav ua lawv le kuv tej kaab ke hab tuav rawv kuv txuj kevcai hab ua lawv nraim, mej txhad le nyob tso sab quas lug huv tebchaws.
Lub tebchaws yuav tuaj qoob loos mas mej yuav tau noj tsau npo hab nyob tso sab plhuav.
Yog mej has tas, “Yog tsw pub peb cog hab sau qoob loos, tes xyoo kws xyaa peb yuav muab daabtsw lug noj?”
Kuv yuav tso moov zoo rua mej rua xyoo kws rau mas lub tebchaws yuav muaj qoob loos txaus peb xyoos.
Thaus mej cog qoob loos rua xyoo kws yim, mej tseed noj tej qoob laug, moog txug xyoo kws cuaj thaus mej tau qoob loos tshab lug mej tseed noj tej qoob laug.
Mej muab tej teb muag tuag tsw tau vem tej aav hov yog kuv le, mej yog qhua tuaj qev nyob xwb.
Thoob plhawv huv lub tebchaws kws mej nyob hov mej yuav pub kuas txhwv tau tej qub aav rov qaab.
“ ‘Yog mej tej kwvtij leejtwg tsua pluag es nwg muab nwg thaaj aav ib qho muag mas nwg tej txheeb kwvtij yuav tsum tuaj txhwv tej kws nwg tau muab muag lawm.
Yog leejtwg tsw muaj kwvtij txhwv tau rua nwg, tassws lug rua tom qaab nwg tsua nplua nuj muaj nyaj txag txaus txhwv tau,
mas ca nwg suav saib muab daim aav muag tau pes tsawg xyoo hab xaam cov nyaj kws tswm nyog thim rov rua tug kws nwg tub muag rua lawm, mas nwg txhad moog nyob tau rua huv nwg thaaj aav ntawd.

Yog nwg tsw muaj nyaj txaus txhwv tau mas thaaj aav hov yuav nyob huv tug kws yuav lawm txhais teg moog txug xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab, mas nwg le muab tso rov rua tug qub tswv rua xyoo Zoo Sab, mas tug qub tswv txhad le rov nyob tau huv nwg thaaj aav.
“ ‘Yog leejtwg muab lub tsev kws nyob huv lub moos kws muaj ntsaa loog muag, mas nwg yuav txhwv tau rua thaus tsw tau dhau ib xyoos. Nwg muaj feem txhwv tau rua thaus txwm nkaus xyoo.

Yog txwm nkaus ib xyoos nwg tsw txhwv tes ca muab hlo lub tsev kws nyob huv lub moos kws muaj ntsaa loog hov ua tug kws yuav le tug moog ib tam dhau ib tam moog le, txug xyoo Zoo Sab los tsw txug muab thim lawm.
Tassws tej tsev huv tej zej zog kws tsw muaj ntsaa loog mas yuav suav zoo ib yaam le tej laj teb, kws txhwv tau rov qaab hab yuav muab tso rov qaab rua xyoo Zoo Sab.
Tassws cov Levi muaj feem txhwv tau tej tsev huv tej moos kws yog puab tug txhua lub swjhawm.

Cov Levi tej tsev huv lub moos kws nwg muab muag mas puab yuav txhwv tau. Txug xyoo Zoo Sab tug kws yuav lub tsev hov yuav muab tso rov ua nwg tug, vem yog cov Levi tej tsev huv cov Levi tej moos yog puab teej puab tug huv cov Yixayee.
Tassws tej moos hov le tshaav yug tsaj muag tsw tau vem tej ntawd yog cov Levi le tug ib txhab ib txhws.
“ ‘Yog mej tej kwvtij leejtwg tsua pluag nrhav tsw tau noj mas mej ca le yug nwg, tassws nwg nrug mej nyob ib yaam le lwm haiv tuabneeg hab tej tuabneeg kws lug nrug mej nyob.
Tsw xob yuav paaj nyag ntawm nwg hab tsw xob yuav tshaaj thawj, yuav tsum paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv sub mej tej kwvtij txhad le nrug taug mej nyob.
Mej tsw xob txais nyaj rua nwg es xaam paaj nyag, lossws tsw xob muag mov noj yuav tshaaj thawj.
Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug sub kuv txhad muab lub tebchaws Khana‑aa pub rua mej, kuv txhad ua tau mej tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Yog mej tej kwvtij leejtwg kws nrug mej nyob tsua pluag es nwg muab nwg tug kheej muag rua mej, mas mej tsw xob kuas nwg ua num yaam le tug qhev.
Ca nwg nrug mej nyob yaam le tej tub zug lossws yaam le tej tuabneeg kws lug nrug mej nyob. Ca nwg ua num rua mej txug xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab xwb,
mas nwg hab nwg tej mivnyuas ca le rov qaab moog cuag nwg kwv nwg tij rov moog nyob nwg tej laug qub txeeg qub teg.
Tsua qhov puab kuj yog kuv cov qhev kws kuv coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, mas puab tsw xob muab puab muag ua qhev.
Mej tsw xob quab yuam tswm txom puab. Mej yuav tsum fwm hab paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv.
Tej tub qhe nkauj qhev kws mej muaj tau mas yuav yog mej yuav ntawm tej tebchaws kws nyob ib ncig mej.
Mej kuj yuav tau ntawm lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob hab yuav ntawm puab tej tuabneeg kws yug huv mej lub tebchaws mas puab yuav poob ua mej tug.
Mej muab tej qhev hov ua ntawv kuas poob ua mej tub ki le qhev ua puab le tug moog ib txhws le kuj tau. Mej swv tau puab ua qhev tassws mej tsw xob quab yuam tswm txom mej cov kwvtij Yixayee.

“ ‘Yog tas lwm haiv tuabneeg lossws lwm tug kws nrug mej nyob nplua nuj tuaj hab mej cov kwvtij kws nrug puab nyob tsua pluag es nwg muab nwg tug kheej muag rua lwm haiv tuabneeg lossws lwm tug kws nrug mej nyob lossws rua lwm haiv tuabneeg tej kwvtij,
mas thaus kws nwg muab nwg tug kheej muag lawd nwg kuj muaj feem txhwv tau rov qaab. Nwg kwv nwg tij txhwv tau rov qaab,
lossws nwg yawm laug nwg txwv ntxawm lossws ob tug le tub, lossws nwg tej kwvtij txheeb ze txhwv kuj tau, lossws yog nwg muaj tuaj nwg kuj txhwv tau nwg tug kheej.

Nwg yuav nrug tug kws yuav nwg xaam saib xyoo kws nwg muag nwg tug kheej tshuav pes tsawg xyoo le txug xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab. Tug nqe kws tso nwg kuas dim yuav suav lawv le cov quas xyoo hov, yuav xaam nqe lawv le nqe tub zug rua thaus nwg nrug tug tswv nyob.
Yog tseed tshuav ntau xyoo nwg yuav tsum them rov qaab kuas txwm cov quas xyoo kws tseed tshuav hov muab xaam ua cov nqe kws txhwv nwg.
Yog tshuav tsw muaj tsawg xyoo yuav txug xyoo Zoo Sab mas kuas tug kws muab nwg muag nrug tug kws yuav nwg xaam lawv le cov quas xyoo kws nwg tseed yuav ua num hov es them rov qaab ua nqe txhwv nwg.
Ca nwg zoo le tug kws ua zug ib xyoos xaam ib xyoos nrug tug tswv nyob. Mej tsw xob pub tug tswv quab yuam tswm txom nwg.
Yog nwg tsw txhwv lawv le kws has nuav los kuj muab nwg hab nwg tej mivnyuas tso kuas dim rua xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab,
vem cov Yixayee yog kuv le tub qhe, puab yog kuv cov tub qhe kws kuv coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug. Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”

“ ‘Mej tsw xob ua txoov daab rua mej lossws txaug txoov daab txawb ca lossws txhus ncej teev daab lossws txaug txoov daab pob zeb rua huv mej lub tebchaws rua mej pe, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej yuav tsum ncu su rua kuv nub Xanpatau hab saib taug lub chaw pe hawm kuv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Yog mej ua lub neej lawv le kuv tej kaab ke hab noog kuv tej lug nkaw hab ua lawv nraim,
kuv yuav pub naag lug lawv caij lawv nyoog rua mej, hab lub tebchaws yuav tau qoob hab tej txwv ntoo huv teb yuav txw txwv.

Lub caij ntaus qoob yuav ntev moog txug lub caij de txwv maab, hab lub caij de txwv maab yuav ntev moog txug lub caij cog qoob, hab mej yuav tau zaub mov noj tsau npo hab nyob tso sab quas lug huv mej lub tebchaws.

Kuv yuav pub kev kaaj sab lug rua huv lub tebchaws, mej yuav tau pw tsw muaj leejtwg ua rua mej ntshai. Kuv yuav tshem tej tsaj nyaum tawm huv lub tebchaws hab nav ntaaj nav rag yuav tsw hlaa mej lub tebchaws le lawm.
Mej yuav lawv mej tej yeeb ncuab tswv hab puab yuav qaug tuag nav ntaaj nav rag taag rua ntawm mej xubndag.
Mej tswb leeg yuav lawv tau yeeb ncuab ib puas leej, hab mej ib puas leej yuav lawv tau ib vaam leej. Mej tej yeeb ncuab yuav qaug tuag nav ntaaj nav rag taag rua ntawm mej xubndag.
Kuv yuav ua zoo rua mej hab pub mej muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob, hab kuv yuav tuav rawv tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua mej.
Mej yuav tau noj tej qoob kws sau lug ca ntev ntev hab mej yuav muab tej qoob qub theej txhad tau chaw rau tej qoob tshab.
Hab kuv yuav ua kuv lub chaw nyob rua huv plawv mej hab kuv lub sab yuav tsw ntxub mej.
Kuv yuav nrug nraim mej nyob hab kuv yuav ua mej tug Vaajtswv hab mej yuav ua kuv haiv tuabneeg.
Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug sub mej txhad tsw tau ua puab qhev. Kuv muab mej tug quab luv pov tseg hab ua rua mej moog tau kev yag ntxag.
“ ‘Tassws yog mej tsw noog kuv lug hab tsw ua lawv le tej lug nkaw nuav huvsw,
yog mej tso kuv tej kaab ke tseg hab mej lub sab ntxub kuv tej kevcai mej txhad tsw yeem ua lawv le kuv tej lug nkaw huvsw hab rhuav kuv tej lug cog tseg,

mas kuv yuav ua le nuav rua mej. Kuv yuav tso kev txhawj kev ntshai, mob phem mob npaws lug raug mej ua rua mej qhov muag daaj taag hab ua rua mej txujsa sem quas zug. Mej yuav cog qoob do do xwb tsua qhov mej tej yeeb ncuab yuav muab noj taag.
Kuv yuav tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam mej, mej yuav swb mej cov yeeb ncuab. Cov kws ntxub mej yuav tau kaav mej, tub tsw muaj leejtwg lawv mej los mej ca le tswv.
Yog ua le nuav lawm, los mej tseed tsw noog kuv lug, kuv yuav rov nplawm mej xyaa npaug dua hab vem yog tim mej tej kev txhum.
Kuv yuav rhuav tshem mej tug fwjchim kws khaav theeb, hab kuv yuav ua rua mej lub ntuj zoo le hlau, hab ua rua mej thaaj aav zoo le tooj lab.
Mej yuav nkim zug do do xwb tsua qhov mej lub tebchaws yuav tsw tau qoob hab tej txwv ntoo huv teb yuav tsw txw txwv.
“ ‘Yog mej tseed tawm tsaam kuv hab tsw yeem noog kuv lug, kuv yuav tso kev txom nyem lug raug mej xyaa npaug lawv le mej tej kev txhum.
Kuv yuav tso tsaj qus lug rua huv mej mas yuav sau mej tej tub ki hab tum mej tej tsaj txhu hab ua rua mej tshuav tsawg tsawg mas mej tej kev txhad tsw muaj tuabneeg taug.
“ ‘Yog qhov kws nplawm nuav mej tseed tsw tig rov lug cuag kuv, mej tseed ua lub neej tawm tsaam kuv,
mas kuv yuav tawm tsaam mej hab kuv tug kheej yuav nplawm mej xyaa npaug vem yog tim mej tej kev txhum.

Kuv yuav coj nav ntaaj nav rag lug rua sau mej, yuav pauj taub kuv tej lug cog tseg. Yog mej sau zog lug rua huv mej tej moos kuv yuav tso mob kis lug raug mej hab mej yuav raug muab cob rua huv yeeb ncuab txhais teg.
Thaus kuv txav mej tej zaub mov tu nrho lawm, kaum tug quaspuj yuav koom tuab lub qhov cub ci ncuav hab yuav muab ncuav kiv quas zug rua mej mas mej noj los yuav tsw tsau.
“ ‘Yog ua le nuav lawm los mej tseed tsw noog kuv lug, mej tseed ua lub neej tawm tsaam kuv,
kuv yuav tawm tsaam mej npau tawg heev, hab kuv tug kheej yuav nplawm mej xyaa npaug vem yog tim mej tej kev txhum.
Mej yuav noj mej tej tub le nqaj, hab noj mej tej ntxhais le nqaj.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej tej chaw sab teev daab puam tsuaj hab rhuav mej tej thaaj hlawv xyaab hab muab mej tej cev tuag nrum rua sau mej tej txoov daab tuag sav. Mas kuv lub sab yuav ntxub mej.
Kuv yuav ua rua mej tej moos raug muab tso tseg pam taag hab ua rua mej tej chaw pe hawm nyob do cuas ca hab kuv yuav tsw na tej paa tsw qaab kws mej hlawv xyeem rua kuv lawm.
Kuv yuav ua rua lub tebchaws lamswm taag mas mej cov yeeb ncuab kws tuaj nyob rua huv yuav xaav tsw thoob le.
Kuv yuav ua rua mej tswv rw quas sua moog nyob rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, kuv yuav rhu ntaaj lawv mej hab mej lub tebchaws yuav nyob do cuas ca hab mej tej moos yuav lamswm taag.
“ ‘Lub swjhawm kws mej nyob huv mej cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws, mej lub tebchaws yuav muaj Xanpatau tau su npaum le cov swjhawm kws nyob do cuas ca hov. Lub tebchaws yuav tau su hab muaj Xanpatau.
Lub tebchaws yuav tau su rua thaus nyob do cuas ca hov, yuav tau su tsw thooj le thaus mej tseed nyob huv lub tebchaw es tsw pub su rua nub Xanpatau.

Mej cov kws tseed tshuav nyob kuv yuav ua rua lub sab ntshai quas rwg rua huv cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws. Lub suab cua ntsawj nplooj qhuav yaa xwb yuav ua rua puab tswv, hab puab yuav tswv yaam nkaus le tswv nav ntaaj nav rag, tub tsw muaj leejtwg lawv los puab yuav qaug taag.
Puab ib leeg yuav dawm ib leeg qaug yaam le tswv nav ntaaj nav rag kuas tub tsw muaj leejtwg lawv, hab mej yuav tsw muaj zug tiv mej cov yeeb ncuab.
Mej yuav tuag taag rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab mej cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws yuav noj mej.
Mej cov kws tseed tshuav nyob los yuav sem zuj zug rua huv mej cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws vem yog tim puab lub txem, hab puab yuav sem zuj zug vem yog tim puab tej laug lub txem hab.
“ ‘Tassws yog puab leeg puab lub txem hab leeg puab tej laug lub txem kws puab tau faav xeeb rua kuv hab ua lub neej tawm tsaam kuv,
es kuv txhad tawm tsaam puab hab coj puab lug rua huv puab cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws, mas thaus puab txu puab lub sab phem sab tawv hab raug puab lub txem dhau lawm,
kuv yuav ncu txug kuv tej lug cog tseg rua Yakhauj hab rua Yiha hab rua Aplahaa, hab kuv yuav ncu txug lub tebchaws hov.

Tassws lub tebchaws yuav raug puab muab tso tseg hab yuav muaj Xanpatau tau su rua thaus kws nyob do cuas ca tsw muaj puab cov tuabneeg nyob huv. Puab yuav raug txem rua puab tej kev txhum kuas taag tsua qhov puab tso kuv tej kevcai tseg hab puab lub sab ntxub kuv tej kaab ke.

Txawm yog le ntawd los xwj, thaus puab nyob huv puab cov yeeb ncuab lub tebchaws kuv yuav tsw tso puab tseg hab kuv yuav tsw ntxub puab txhad tsw muab puab ua kuas puam tsuaj taag nrho hab tsw rhuav kuv tej lug kws cog tseg rua puab, tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Vem yog saib rua puab kuv txhad ncu txug tej lug kws cog tseg rua puab tej laug kws kuv coj tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug taab meeg ib tsoom tebchaws, sub kuv txhad le tau ua puab tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
Tej nuav yog tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai hab tej lug qha kws Yawmsaub muab rua cov Yixayee sau lub roob Xinai kws nwg qha rua Mauxe.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus leejtwg yeem lug tseem ceeb tas nwg yuav pub hlo tuabneeg rua Yawmsaub ua Yawmsaub tug, mas yuav xaam nqe txhwv le nuav.
Tug txwvneej kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum txug rau caum xyoo mas ntaus nqe tswb caug sekhee nyaj,  lawv le sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub.
Yog ib tug quaspuj mas ntaus nqe peb caug sekhee nyaj.
Yog tug hov noob nyoog muaj tswb xyoos txug neeg nkaum xyoo, mas ntaus nqe rua tug tub neeg nkaum sekhee nyaj,  hab tug ntxhais kaum sekhee.
Yog tug hov noob nyoog muaj ib hlis txug tswb xyoo mas ntaus nqe rua tug tub tswb sekhee nyaj  hab ntaus nqe rua tug ntxhais peb sekhee.
Yog tug hov noob nyoog muaj rau caum xyoo rov sau yuav ntaus nqe rua tug txwvneej kaum tswb sekhee nyaj  hab rua tug quaspuj kaum sekhee.

Yog leejtwg pluag pluag them tsw taug lawv le mej ntaus nqe lawm, mas yuav coj tug tuabneeg kws muab pub rua Yawmsaub hov tuaj cuag tug pov thawj mas tug pov thawj yuav ntaus nqe rua nwg lawv le tug kws yeem lug them taug.
“ ‘Yog nwg yeem pub ib yaam tsaj kws tuabneeg txeev pub xyeem rua Yawmsaub, mas txhua yaam kws nwg muab pub rua Yawmsaub hov dawb huv lawm.

Nwg tsw xob coj daabtsw tuaj pauv tuaj txauv, muab yaam kws zoo pauv yaam kws tsw zoo lossws muab yaam kws tsw zoo pauv yaam kws zoo. Yog nwg muab tsaj txauv le hov mas tug kws txauv hab tug kws raug muab txauv kuj dawb huv ib yaam nkaus.
Yog nwg pub ib tug tsaj qas tsw huv kws yeej tsw yog yaam tsaj kws pub xyeem rua Yawmsaub, mas yuav coj tug tsaj hov moog cuag tug pov thawj.
Mas tug pov thawj yuav ntaus nqe lawv le tug tsaj zoo lossws tsaj tsw zoo. Tug pov thawj ntaus nqe npaum le caag kuj ca yuav npaum le ntawd.
Yog tug tswv xaav txhwv tug tsaj hov rov qaab nwg yuav tsum ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua tug nqe kws ntaus lawd.

“ ‘Thaus leejtwg cais pub hlo nwg lub tsev ua yaam kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub, mas tug pov thawj yuav ntaus nqe lawv le lub tsev zoo lossws tsw zoo. Tug pov thawj ntaus nqe npaum le caag kuj ca yuav lawv le ntawd.
Yog tug kws pub hlo lub tsev hov xaav txhwv lub tsev rov qaab kuj ca nwg ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua tug nqe kws ntaus lawd mas lub tsev txhad rov ua nwg tug.

“ ‘Yog leejtwg muab nwg ib thaaj teb kws yog nwg nam nwg txwv qub txeeg qub teg cais pub rua Yawmsaub, mas yuav ntaus nqe rua daim teb hov lawv le ntim taug noob qoob ntau los tsawg. Yog daim teb ntim taag ib haumaw  cov noob qoob mas ntaus nqe tswb caug sekhee nyaj.
Yog nwg pub daim teb rua xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab kuj ntaus nqe txwm nkaus le mej has.
Yog nwg pub daim teb ua qaab xyoo Zoo Sab hov kuj ca tug pov thawj xaam nqe lawv le cov quas xyoo kws tseed tshuav moog txug xyoo Zoo Sab tom ntej, mas yuav nqeg nqe tsw yuav txwm le mej xub has.
Yog tug kws pub daim teb hov xaav txhwv daim teb rov qaab, nwg yuav tsum ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua tug nqe kws ntaus lawd daim teb txhad rov ua nwg le.
Yog nwg tsw tau txhwv daim teb lossws yog nwg muab daim teb muag rua lwm tug lawm, mas tsw pub nwg txhwv le lawm.

Daim teb hov mas thaus yuav muab tso dawb tseg rua xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab, yuav muab ua daim teb kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub, zoo le ib daig teb kws muab cais rua Yawmsaub lawm, tug pov thawj yuav ua tswv teb moog le.
Yog nwg muab daim teb kws nwg yuav lug cais pub rua Yawmsaub, tsw yog daim kws nwg txwv qub txeeg qub teg,
tug pov thawj yuav xaam daim teb hov le nqe moog txug xyoo Zoo Sab, mas nub hov tug tswv teb yuav tsum them nyaj npaum le kws ntaus nqe ca ua yaam kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub.
Thaus txug xyoo Zoo Sab daim teb hov poob rov rua tug qub tswv kws muag rua nwg vem daim teb hov yog tug qub tswv le qub txeeg qub teg.
Yuav tsum ntaus nqe rua txhua yaam lawv le nyaj sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub. Neeg nkaum kela muaj ib sekhee.
“ ‘Thawj tug mivnyuas tsaj txhu mas tsw xob kheev leejtwg muab cais pub hlo rua Yawmsaub tsua qhov thawj tug mivnyuas tsaj yeej yog Yawmsaub le lawm, tsw has nyuj los yaaj los yeej yog Yawmsaub le.

Yog nwg pub ib tug tsaj qas tsw huv tes kuas nwg them nyaj yuav rov qaab lawv le tug nqe kws koj ntaus hab ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua sau. Yog nwg tsw txhwv mas muab tug tsaj hov muag lawv le tug nqe kws koj ntaus ca lawd.

“ ‘Tassws yaam twg kws yog nwg le es nwg muab pub hlo rua Yawmsaub lawm tsw has tuabneeg lossws tsaj txhu lossws teb kws yog nwg nam nwg txwv qub txeeg qub teg, mas muag tsw tau hab txhwv tsw tau le. Tsua qhov txhua yaam kws muab pub hlo hov yog yaam kws dawb huv kawg nkaus rua Yawmsaub.
Cov tuabneeg kws raug muab cais pub rua Yawmsaub ua kuas puam tsuaj taag, mas txhwv tsw tau hlo le, yuav tsum muab cov hov tua pov tseg.
“ ‘Ib feem huv kaum taag nrho kws tau huv lub tebchaws, yog tej qoob loos hab tej txwv maab txwv ntoo puavleej yog Yawmsaub le, yog tej kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub.
Yog leejtwg xaav txhwv ib feem kaum hov ib qho rov rua nwg, nwg yuav tsum ntxwv ib feem huv tswb rua sau.
Ib feem kaum kws tau huv tej nyuj tej tshws tej yaaj, kws yog ib tug huv kaum tug kws chaws tug qhev yug tug paas nreg, mas yog tej tsaj kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub.
Nwg tsw xob xaiv saib yog tug zoo los tsw zoo hab tsw xob muab txauv. Yog nwg muab txauv mas tug kws coj tuaj txauv hab tug kws raug muab txauv puavleej dawb huv huvsw lawm txhwv tsw tau.’ ”
Tej nuav yog tej lug nkaw kws Yawmsaub cob rua Mauxe sau lub roob Xinai kuas coj lug rua cov Yixayee.
